amendment.description: To eliminate methyl tertiary butyl ether from the United States fuel supply, to increase production and use of renewable fuel, and to increase the Nation's energy independence.

action.text: Amendment SA 3050 ruled non-germane by the chair.
Point of order raised in Senate with respect to amendment SA 3050.
Cloture on amendment S.A. 3050 not invoked in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 40 - 59. Record Vote Number: 73.
Cloture motion on amendment SA 3050 presented in Senate.

Amendment SA 3050 proposed by Senator Daschle to language proposed to be stricken by amendment no. 3048. (consideration: CR S4406-4413) To eliminate methyl tertiary butyl ether from the United States fuel supply, to increase production and use of renewable fuel, and to increase the Nation's energy independence.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Cloture on amendment S.A. 3050 not invoked in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 40 - 59. Record Vote Number: 73.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3050 proposed by Senator Daschle to language proposed to be stricken by amendment no. 3048.
